name: Neoblox Tournaments
description:
Discover one of the most exciting puzzle games on mobile today. This special eSports tournaments mode is powered by the Skillz platform.

Win real money in live 1v1 matches and tournaments against other players all over the globe!

Or simply play for fun, compete and climb the leaderboard!

COLORFUL COMPETITIVE BLOCK PUZZLE

SIMPLE AND SATISFYING – Classic block puzzle gameplay you’ll love

THREE-MINUTE FUN - Grab a quick fix of fun whenever you want

WIN CASH – Compete for real money in head to head matches and tournaments


If you have any questions about the Skillz system or cash tournaments please contact: support@skillz.com
